title: RIOT - Have you noticed the number of BOTS in ARAM??
body:
Dear RIOT,

In case you hadn't noticed farming BOTS are rampant in ARAM.
Here's a game from yesterday if it wasn't evident enough:
[http://oi58.tinypic.com/2jepf0i.jpg](http://oi58.tinypic.com/2jepf0i.jpg)

Here are just a few other people posting about the issue, can you please do something about it - thanks:
[1](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/LXPrVZeX-bots-in-aram) [2](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/5Urxyo4y-bots-in-aram) [3](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/AaK8JVqu-wtf-so-many-bots-in-aram) [4](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/vJO40iGa-suspicious-aram-players-3rd-party-bots) [5](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/wzJkwKrh-why-tf-are-there-bots-in-aram-i-want-to-play-pvp-not-bots) [6](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/gRiqldIj-bots-everywhere) [7](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/neaEogj3-aram-filled-with-bots) [8](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/EP5pUH6t-suggestion-to-prevent-aram-botting) [9](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/NEV1IQGJ-botting-in-aram) [10](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/FENpgaKp-bots-in-aram) [11](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/KZ5303Tx-bots-on-aram) [12](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/jfNXFK6q-bots-in-aram) [13](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/lNAGArUf-wtf-so-many-bots-in-aram) [14](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/MkQEMxGK-bots-in-aram) [15](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/TATELE7x-bots-in-aram)

And that's just from the 1st page of the search results...

replies.body: [so this was one of my games...](http://i.imgur.com/qchmKIC.png)

Wow! That was bad! 9 bots in 1 game!!
I'm having games like that too: [link](http://oi65.tinypic.com/5cxemv.jpg)
Yep, take off prep & minion time and that works out to be about a 6 min game..
lol i've never seen an aram bot
hang on a minute. theres no way riot can make money from fixing this problem. rip
Riot makes money from balancing champions, that doesn't mean bots in ARAM is a bigger problem worth solving over the one that does give them money...
